title: Changes can happen at any time and sometimes without notice.

tosdr.case: user needs to rely on tosback.org
tosdr.tldr: Changes to the terms are considered accepted and effective either 5 days after they are published on the website, or when they notify you, or when you accept them.

topics.description: Services need to evolve. But it is important that updating the service does not break the consentment with the user. Updates and changes to terms of service and privacy policy need to be properly noticed to users and to sollicit their agreement again.
